lead_paragraph: ISRAEL--Justin B. The Board of Directors and staff of Arc of Westchester and Arc of Westchester Foundation mourn the loss of Justin B. Israel, a guiding light to us all. Friend, parent, board member, transformational donor and trusted advisor, Justin was an inspirational figure with boundless commitment to our mission. His passionate advocacy and extraordinary generosity have had a deep and lasting impact on the lives of thousands of people with developmental disabilities. Beloved by all, he will be deeply missed. We offer our heartfelt condolences to Emel and the rest of his family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ISRAEL, JUSTIN B
